    • Vertex

      public Vertex​(int index, @NotNull @NotNull org.lwjglx.util.vector.Vector3f position)
      This is a constructor for a Vertex. Here you can create a vertex with an index number and position.
      Parameters:
      index - int index of the Vertex.
      position - Vector3f position of the vertex.

  • Method Details

    • hasSameTextureAndNormal

      public boolean hasSameTextureAndNormal​(int textureIndexOther, int normalIndexOther)
      This checks if a vertex has the same textures and normals.
      Parameters:
      textureIndexOther - int texture index of the texture you want to check with.
      normalIndexOther - int normal index of the normal you want to check with.
      Returns:
      boolean true if texture and normal are the same false if not.
